codeReview.summary: Implementation matches the feature contract: wrapError performs typed passthrough before mapper invocation, untyped mapper path with InternalError fallback, composeMappers preserves declared order and short-circuits, root exports were added, and a minor changeset was included.

sharedStateObservations.observation: Build tooling auto-runs normalize-exports and mutates package.json (including export map ordering/additions), but this behavior is not documented in mission/shared-state docs; the worker had to investigate whether package.json changes were expected.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: Transcript skeleton for d72d8e60-2d42-4f66-afbe-24358934b63e includes an explicit investigation step ('package.json change is from build output (normalize-exports)'). Commit 898aeb3d shows a broad package.json reorder plus new ./wrap-error export.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The library-worker skill has contradictory guidance: its Verify procedure warns not to run bun run check, but the Example Handoff still includes bun run check.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: /Users/mg/Developer/outfitter/stack/.factory/skills/library-worker/SKILL.md â€” Verify section says 'Do NOT use 'bun run check'', while Example Handoff commandsRun includes `{ "command": "bun run check" ... }`.

summary: Reviewed handoff, transcript skeleton, and commit 898aeb3d for os-333-wrap-error. The implementation satisfies the specified behavior and export requirements in scope; review status is pass.
